channel.title: 667/*** slayer help
channel.description:
hey , i got this slayer master which gives takss and everything is good but when u get task like zombies you go to kill a zombie but it doenst count ur kills so no exp u get
can anyone figure out how to fix this? a mistake i made at skills.java or something
thanks

item.title: 667/*** slayer help
item.dc:creator: @llcoolchris llcoolchris
item.description:
@llcoolchris wrote:

Search for the slayer monster’s that do work using the spawn java file. then search for the npcid in the slayer java file. once you find it add the same thing but for the zombie npc’s using the npcid of the zombies you are trying to kill.

(the exact files I dont really know, people like to rename things esp on 667’s+) but it should have slayer or skill in the java file name

Read full topic
